issue.title: [Python] Allow subscripting pyarrow.lib.StructValue
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2286](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2286). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```python

>>> obj
{'x': 42, 'y': True}
>>> type(obj)
pyarrow.lib.StructValue
>>> obj['x']
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<ipython-input-96-93ad3443b3c6>", line 1, in <module>
    obj['x']
TypeError: 'pyarrow.lib.StructValue' object is not subscriptable
```
